| History                 = The death of a Japanese [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] agent at the [[United Nations Headquarters]] in [[New York City]] lead [[Clinton Barton (Earth-616)|Hawkeye]], [[Barbara Morse (Earth-616)|Mockingbird]], and [[Dominic Fortune III (Earth-616)|Dominic Fortune]] to [[Sakha]], [[Russia]] where they met up with the [[Natalia Romanova (Earth-616)|Black Widow]] who was investigating the mass murder of [[Komitet Gosudarstvennoy Bezopasnosti (Earth-616)|KGB]] trainees.{{r|Widowmaker #1}} Surveillance video revealed the killings were carried out by the Dark Ocean Society lead by a new Ronin;{{r|Widowmaker #2}} however, before their investigation was completed, the group was attacked by the [[Supreme Soviets (Earth-616)|Supreme Soviets]] and were forced to split up. Hawkeye and Black Widow traveled to [[Sapporo]], [[Japan]], the base of operations of the Dark Ocean Society, while Mockingbird and Dominic headed to the tip of the [[Kamchatka Krai|Kamchatka Peninsula]] following mass [[Russian Armed Forces (Earth-616)|Russian troop]] movements.{{r|Widowmaker #3}} The group reunited on the disputed [[Kuril Islands]] and discovered that the identity of the new Ronin to be [[Alexi Shostakov (Earth-616)|Alexi Shostakov]], the original Red Guardian and Black Widow's ex-husband. Shostakov revealed he intended to force a war between Russia and Japan that would restore Russia's former glory. A battle ensued as the heroes took on a combination of the Dark Ocean Society and the Supreme Soviets. During the battle Hawkeye received a critical blow to the head; however, Widow managed to take down Shostakov with the help of [[Fantasma (Dark Ocean Society) (Earth-616)|Fantasma]].{{r|Widowmaker #4}}
